#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

#define INF 10000007

long mem[10002][6];

void init()
{
	for(int i=0;i<10002;i++)
		for(int j=0;j<7;j++)
			mem[i][j]=-1;
}

long calc(int n, int b)
{
	if((n<=0)||(b<=0))
		return 1;
	if(mem[n][b]!=-1)
		return mem[n][b];
	long ans;
	(ans=1+calc(n,b-1))%=INF;
	(ans+=calc(n-1,b-1))%=INF;
	(ans+=calc(n-2,b-1))%=INF;
	(ans+=calc(n-3,b-1))%=INF;
	(ans+=calc(n-4,b-1))%=INF;
	(ans+=calc(n-6,b-1))%=INF;	
	(ans+=calc(n-1,b))%=INF;
	(ans+=calc(n-2,b))%=INF;	
	(ans+=calc(n-3,b))%=INF;
	(ans+=calc(n-5,b))%=INF;
	(ans+=calc(n-1,b))%=INF;
	(ans+=calc(n-2,b))%=INF;	
	(ans+=calc(n-5,b))%=INF;
	(ans+=calc(n-7,b))%=INF;
	(ans+=calc(n,b-1))%=INF;
	mem[n][b]=ans;
	return mem[n][b];
}

int main()
{
	init();
	int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	int k=t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		cout<<"Case "<<k-t<<": "<<calc(n,6)<<endl;
	}
}
